dao.name: GET_MIDDLE_TYP_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) middle_typ_count from hkproduct_rf where athena_id= :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(middle_typ) = trim(:middle_typ) and rownum =1

dao.name: GET_SMALL_TYP_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) small_typ_count from hkproduct_rf where athena_id= :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(small_typ) = trim(:small_typ) and rownum =1

dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, middle_typ, small_typ, product_nos, product_nam, unit_typ, unit_amt, cost_amt, amodify_sta, inv_sta, service_sta, opencode_sta, serv_rat, view_seq, use_sta, goods_cod, item_nos, serv_nos, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hkproduct_rf where trim(athena_id) = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = ?

dao.name: QRY_SINGLE_HKPRODUCT_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, middle_typ, small_typ, product_nos, product_nam, unit_typ, unit_amt, cost_amt, amodify_sta, inv_sta, service_sta, opencode_sta, serv_rat, view_seq, use_sta, goods_cod, item_nos, serv_nos, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hkproduct_rf where trim(athena_id) = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = ? and product_nos = ?

dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF_MIDDLE_TYP
dao.statement: select middle_typ as value, typ_nam as display from hkmtype_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRYHKPRODUCTRFSMALLTYP
dao.statement: select small_typ as value, typ_nam as display, middle_typ from hkstype_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: GETHKPRODUCTRFMIDDLETYP
dao.statement: select small_typ as value, typ_nam as display, middle_typ from hkstype_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(small_typ) = trim(:small_typ)

dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF_GOODS_COD
dao.statement: select g.goods_cod goods_cod, g.goods_sna goods_sna, g.goods_rmk goods_rmk, rf.group_cod || ':' || rf.group_nam as group_nam from goods_mn g,group_rf rf where g.athena_id = rf.athena_id and g.comp_cod = rf.comp_cod and g.group_cod = rf.group_cod and rf.set_cod = 'S' and g.goods_sta<>'D' and g.goods_flag4 in ('1','2') and g.sys_flag = '1' and g.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(rf.comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod)

dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF_ITEM_NOS
dao.statement: select item_nos as value, item_sna as display from service_rf a inner join servtype_rf b on a.athena_id = b.athena_id and a.hotel_cod = b.hotel_cod and a.serv_typ = b.serv_typ where a.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(a.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and a.account_sta = 'Y' and a.system_typ = 'HFD' and a.data_typ = 'N' and a.income_sta = 'Y' and a.serv_typ <> '98' and a.item_nos not in ( 's999', 's998') and b.use_typ in ('1', '2')

dao.name: QRY_HKPRODUCT_RF_SERV_NOS
dao.statement: select item_nos as value, item_sna as display from service_rf a inner join servtype_rf b on a.athena_id = b.athena_id and a.hotel_cod = b.hotel_cod and a.serv_typ = b.serv_typ where a.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(a.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and a.account_sta = 'Y' and a.system_typ = 'HFD' and a.data_typ = 'N' and a.income_sta = 'Y' and a.serv_typ <> '98' and a.item_nos not in ( 's999', 's998') and b.use_typ in ('1', '2')
